name: Animal Orphan Care
description:
The world is plagued by The Levelers, humans who grind monsters for sweet, sweet loot and levels. In this little demo-game you're an older woman who saves baby monster orphans to give them a home safe from the human gamers.

I made this very tiny demo-game like a "feeler", to see if there are people who like games like this that are more focused on nurturing/wholesome aspects. I would love to hear any thoughts you have on what you like/don't like (also on the theme). 

I may make a full game in the future with more fleshed out mechanics if the concept appeals to people some :) It would have simpler art (because the art I made for this version is too time-consuming on a larger scale) but thematically similar.

Hope you like it!
